details.description: Creative Design Studio is a graphic design business based in Portland, OR. Founded by Sarah Johnson, it specializes in modern, minimal branding and logo design for small businesses and startups.

heroContent.headline: Minimal Design, Maximum Impact
heroContent.subheadline: Logo and brand identity design for small businesses who want to look professional from day one.

image.alt: Abstract branding sketches on a desk

aboutContent.title: About Our Business
aboutContent.text: Creative Design Studio helps small businesses build lasting first impressions through thoughtful branding.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To help small businesses succeed through accessible, high-quality branding that reflects their values and speaks to their customers.

companyInfo.text: Established in 2019, based in Portland, OR
Specialized in logo and brand identity design

servicesContent.title: Our Services
servicesContent.subtitle: Design solutions tailored to small business growth.

services.title: Logo Design
services.description: Crafted, scalable logo designs built to grow with your business.

services.title: Brand Identity
services.description: Visual systems that include color palette, typography, and brand guidelines.

services.title: Marketing Materials
services.description: Designs for business cards, flyers, and social templates aligned with your brand.

projectsContent.title: Recent Client Work
projectsContent.subtitle: Explore our branding and identity projects.

caseStudies.title: Bloom Boutique Logo
caseStudies.description: Soft, elegant logo for a Portland-based florist that reflects modern femininity.
caseStudies.results: Improved brand recall and store foot traffic

caseStudies.title: CraftHaus Branding Kit
caseStudies.description: Full brand system for a local woodcraft business, blending rustic and modern aesthetics.
caseStudies.results: Unified presence across print and digital

testimonialsContent.title: What Clients Say
testimonialsContent.subtitle: Real feedback from real small business owners.

testimonials.name: Nina Feldman
testimonials.quote: The branding Sarah created brought my shop to life. Clients mention the logo all the time!

testimonials.name: Ben Carter
testimonials.quote: Sarah turned vague ideas into a beautiful brand that feels just right. Couldn’t recommend her more.

processContent.title: Our Process
processContent.subtitle: Simple and collaborative from start to finish.

steps.title: Discovery
steps.description: Understand your business, audience, and goals.

steps.title: Concepts
steps.description: Sketch and refine initial design directions.

steps.title: Build the System
steps.description: Create the full visual identity and apply it across materials.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: Provide all files and brand documentation ready for launch.

footerContent.tagline: Helping small businesses look big through clean, intentional design.

contactContent.title: Request a Free Quote
contactContent.subtitle: Let’s talk about how we can build your brand together.
contactContent.infoText: Whether you're just starting or need a refresh, we’ll help your business look its best.

form.successText: Thanks for reaching out. We’ll respond shortly.
